profile.name: Olatunbosun Olashubomi
profile.title: Software Engineer | Web, Mobile & Automation Engineer

resumeSummary: Software Engineer with strong full-stack delivery across web and mobile applications. I build scalable, maintainable products with clean APIs, authentication flows, and reliable database integration.
I collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, participate in Agile ceremonies, and create clear technical documentation to support onboarding and long-term product sustainability.

projects.title: API Platform
projects.description: A modular REST API with clean architecture, robust error handling, and authentication-ready patterns.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.description: A fast, responsive dashboard with clean UI, reliable API integration, and performance-focused components.

projects.title: Workflow Automation
projects.description: Automation-first tooling and integrations that reduce manual work, with pragmatic AI-assisted features.

highlights: Collaborated closely with a cross-functional team to design, build, and maintain an internal product from concept to production.

Worked in Agile ceremonies (sprint planning, stand-ups, retrospectives).
Built RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services to streamline application processes.

Used Git workflows to collaborate, resolve conflicts, and keep a clean development pipeline.
